Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1967...
Injured on 6/3/1967 with a Blister On Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/9/1972 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1973, off Manny Montejo (OAK)...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Injured on 5/12/1978 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for entire career...
Injured on 7/29/1979 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/18/1979 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/2/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
